content: Pre-authorization form submitted for Gavin T. Wildermuth (Patient ID 487632WQ) regarding neuromodulation implant surgery at Alderwood Neurosciences. Procedure scheduled for April 22, 2024 under policy XG229-884P. Additional documentation required concerning prior denials for nerve ablation treatments in 2023.
